import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Mostra } from 'src/app/models/mostra.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-mostra-card', templateUrl: './mostra-card.component.html', styleUrls: ['./mostra-card.component.scss'] }) export class MostraCardComponent { @Input() mostre: Mostra[]; }
